title: Episode 79: Models of Leadership - Joan of Arc, Alexander the Great and Ginger the Chicken?
description: Who's the best role model for a leader?  How about a chicken?  In this episode of The Psych Files we examine Ginger from the movie Chicken Run to see how she embodies some of the best qualities of a leader.  I'll apply several leadership theories to Ginger and her vision.
